title: APDU result receive event
description: APDU results given on specific transceiveId

traceId.description: An unique message identifier - UUID v4

transceiveId.description: Unique identifier (UUID v4) passed in from transmit. Groups results with initial command lists.

eventTimestamp.description: Time stamp for the time the command list was generated. UTC in RFC3339 format.

deviceId.description: Unique device identifier. Unique for local system (in bus)

commandId.description: Incremental number denoting what command it is in a specific sequence.

frame.description: Result value from command with specific corresponding commandId. May be empty string if not matching expected prefix, but will always be defined. Value in hex starting with 0x.

result.description: List of results to specific commands denoted by commandId and hex buffered result.
